Title: Smugglers' Den (Net Loft)
EnterText: Netting hangs like cobwebs; a whispering ladder dips into shadow.

Options.Text: Hand over a construct bolt (they pay in coin).
Options.Label: Hand over a construct bolt (they pay in coin).

Options.Text: Give the dock-sign and ask for a contact.
Options.Label: Give the dock-sign and ask for a contact.

Description: A net loft that smells of pitch, tar, and quiet arrangements.
Paragraphs: The rafters are a forest of ropes and hooks; lantern light beads on the lines like amber caught in webbing.
Conversations run under the floorboards - soft as the tide, sharp as a hook. A ladder vanishes into a slit that leads nowhere anyone speaks of openly.
